data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Burnley's area.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Robbie Brady.
That's a fine assist from Ashley Westwood.
In the minute 7, Important block from the Burnley defence as James Rodriguez fires in a strike for Everton.
Burnley needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Burnley.
In the minute 9, Burnley to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Burnley drive upfield and Chris Wood gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Everton defender.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Everton at Turf Moor.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin of Everton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 13, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Alex Iwobi for Everton drives towards goal at Turf Moor. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Everton's Richarlison is on target but unsuccessful.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Burnley's Josh Brownhill breaks free at Turf Moor. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Anthony Taylor awards Everton a goal kick.
Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a Burnley throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Everton in the half of Burnley.
Free kick Everton.
Anthony Taylor waits before resuming play because Fabian Delph for Everton is still down.
In the minute 29, Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a first change, with Andre Gomes replacing the possibly injured Fabian Delph.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Andre Gomes (Everton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Burnley.
Richarlison of Everton is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Anthony Taylor signals a Burnley throw-in in Everton's half.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Everton's Richarlison gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Burnley have a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 39, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 41, Chris Wood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
Throw-in Burnley.
Anthony Taylor blows against Everton's Andre Gomes for offside.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Chris Wood for Burnley is back on the field again.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
In the minute 45, Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half is over at Turf Moor.
In the minute 45, Attention is being given to Burnley’s Chris Wood and play has been suspended briefly.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Turf Moor.
Great play from Richarlison to set up the goal.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin has run offside.
Richarlison (Everton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Everton.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Everton.
In the minute 51, Everton's James Rodriguez gets in a shot on goal at Turf Moor. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Everton are coming forward and Richarlison gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Can Burnley capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Burnley to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 57, Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
In the minute 65, Burnley to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Anthony Taylor signals a Burnley throw-in in Everton's half.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Burnley push forward at Turf Moor and Robbie Brady gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Everton defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, In Burnley, James Rodriguez of Everton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Chris Wood is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Burnley’s Chris Wood is on his feet again at Turf Moor.
Goal kick for Everton at Turf Moor.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Sean Dyche (Burnley) is making a first substitution, with Ashley Barnes replacing Jay Rodriguez.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Burnley.
In the minute 78, Burnley's Josh Brownhill gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Everton defender.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 80, Important block from the Burnley defence as Alex Iwobi fires in a strike for Everton.
In Burnley Everton attack through Andre Gomes. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
Throw-in Burnley.
Throw-in for Everton at Turf Moor.
In the minute 81, Gylfi Sigurdsson is on a sub for Abdoulaye Doucoure for Everton.
In the minute 82, In Burnley Everton drive forward through Dominic Calvert-Lewin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Everton.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 83, Burnley push upfield and Chris Wood gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Everton defence.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 86, Robbie Brady is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The home team has substituted Robbie Brady with Josh Benson. Sean Dyche is thus making his second change.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Burnley in Burnley.
Cenk Tosun is replacing Allan for Everton at Turf Moor.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In Burnley Everton drive forward through Gylfi Sigurdsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Dwight McNeil of Burnley gets in a strike, but is off target.
Anthony Taylor awards Everton a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Burnley have a goal kick.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
